actionPack.name: LifeRay
actionPack.description: Integration actions for the LifeRay portal.  More information available at www.liferay.com.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

RESTAction.name: Liferay - Add User Group
RESTAction.description: Add user group to the LifeRay portal.

inputParamList.name: user
inputParamList.description: The user name to authenticate with the LifeRay RESTful service.

inputParamList.name: password
inputParamList.description: The password to authenticate with the LifeRay RESTful service.

inputParamList.name: Host
inputParamList.description: The hostname for the LifeRay RESTful service.

inputParamList.name: Port
inputParamList.description: The port for the LifeRay RESTful service.

inputParamList.name: Description
inputParamList.description: The description of a new user group.

inputParamList.name: Name
inputParamList.description: The name of a new user group.

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: This output parameter holds the complete raw output of the RESTful Action execution
